dcterms:description: The TCGA dataset consists of both MRI and genomic data for glioblastoma patients, utilized for survival prediction and tumor segmentation.
dcterms:title: TCGA (The Cancer Genome Atlas)

dcterms:description: BraTS-2017 dataset contains multimodal MRI scans of glioblastoma patients, used for training and validating models for tumor segmentation and synthesis.
dcterms:title: BraTS-2017
